replies.body: Potatoes are made into Vodka and I sure do love me some Vodka! *hic*

I enjoy a good potato every now and then.  I even made a cheesy, potato scallop bake for the holiday.  I might also visit potato naysh every now and then.  

Potato dump:

http://foodnetwork.sndimg.com/content/dam/images/food/fullset/2011/2/28/1/FNM_040111-Easter-Sides-013_s4x3.jpg.rend.sniipadlarge.jpeg
